unnormalised: Arre yaar, remember when they announced India's independence? Must've been a crazy time! I read somewhere it was officially declared on 15/08/1947. Imagine the celebrations! Also, Gandhi ji's birthday, 2nd Oct, is a day we all remember from school. Feels like ages ago, doesn't it? Even Partition started around Aug '47, so much happened then.
normalised: Arre yaar, remember when they announced India's independence? Must've been a crazy time! I read somewhere it was officially declared on fifteenth August nineteen forty seven. Imagine the celebrations! Also, Gandhi ji's birthday, second October, is a day we all remember from school. Feels like ages ago, doesn't it? Even Partition started around August nineteen forty seven, so much happened then.
